subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Rashard Mendenhall and Juice Williams carried the HOST Illini to a 31-26 victory over No. 5 Wisconsin yesterday, ending the Badgers’ 14-game winning streak, which was the longest in the Football Bowl Subdivision.
snippet: Rashard Mendenhall and Juice Williams carried the HOST Illini to a 31-26 victory over No. 5 Wisconsin yesterday, ending the Badgers’ 14-game winning streak, which was the longest in the Football Bowl Subdivision.
